list.name: Eureka
list.desc: Beginning with you and proceeding in turn order, each player may choose a Planeswalker, creature, enchantment, artifact, or land card in his or her hand and put that card onto the battlefield. Continue until each player in turn has declined to put a card onto the battlefield.

list.name: Air Strike
list.desc: Put three 2/1 Eagle tokens of all colors with flying and haste onto the battlefield. At the end of the turn, sacrifice all Eagle tokens.

list.name: Feldon’s Cane
list.desc: Reshuffle your graveyard into your library.

list.name: EnchantWorldLand
list.desc: Roll on EnchantWorldLand.

list.name: Footbottom Feast
list.desc: Put any number of creatures from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card.

list.name: Tranquility
list.desc: Destroy all enchantments.

list.name: Roll three times
list.desc: Roll three Chaos Rolls.

list.name: Rushing River
list.desc: Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. You may sacrifice a land to return another target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.

list.name: Tainted Energy
list.desc: Choose one – Lose 1d6 life; or target opponent gains 1d6 life.

list.name: Roll that Fork
list.desc: Get a RollFork Counter. Sacrifice RollFork to duplicate the effects of any roll just rolled. You choose all new targets.

list.name: Secret Cache
list.desc: Shuffle your deck. If your top card after the shuffle is a Planeswalker, creature, enchantment, artifact, or land card, put it onto the battlefield. If not, lose 1 life and shuffle again. Repeat until you get a Planeswalker, creature, enchantment, artifact, or land card.

list.name: Exhume
list.desc: Each player puts a creature card from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.

list.name: Neutral Plane
list.desc: Destroy all non-Aura enchantments.

list.name: Sworn Enemy
list.desc: Target creature gains protection from a color of your choice until the end of turn.

list.name: Abandon Hope
list.desc: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Look at target opponent’s hand and choose that number of cards from it. That player discards those cards.

list.name: Mute
list.desc: You may not cast a spell this turn.

list.name: Threshold Command
list.desc: Each player puts cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard until there are at least seven cards in his or her graveyard.

list.name: Balance
list.desc: Except the player who controls the fewest lands, each player sacrifices lands until all players control the same number of lands as the player who controls the fewest. Players do the same for creatures and for cards in hand.

list.name: Ancestral Recall
list.desc: Target player draws three cards.

list.name: Memory Lapse
list.desc: Skip your draw phase this turn.

list.name: Terminate
list.desc: Destroy target creature.

list.name: Prosperity
list.desc: Each player draw 1d10 cards. (Roll once for everybody.)

list.name: Enlightened Tutor
list.desc: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library and then put the revealed card on top. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay W or 3 to draw a card.

list.name: Gauntlet of Chaos
list.desc: Exchange control of target artifact, creature, or land you control for control of target permanent of the same type an opponent controls. Then, destroy all enchantments enchanted on those permanents.

list.name: Déjà Vu
list.desc: Each player shuffles the cards in his or her graveyard and puts those cards on top of his or her library.

list.name: Manipulate Fate
list.desc: Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle your library. Draw a card.

list.name: Syphon Soul
list.desc: Deal 2 damage to each opponent and gain 1 life for each damage dealt.

list.name: Demonic Tutor
list.desc: Search your library for a card and put it in your hand. Then, shuffle your library.

list.name: Simplicity’s Reward
list.desc: Each player gains 1 life for each basic land he or she controls. Each player takes 1 damage for each nonbasic land he or she controls.

list.name: Solid Fog
list.desc: As long as you remain in the game, until your next turn, no attack phases may be declared.

list.name: Mating Call
list.desc: At the beginning of your first main phase, you may pay 1 plus the converted mana cost of a creature in any graveyard. If you do, exile that creature card and put a token copy of that creature onto the battlefield under your control.

list.name: Better Off Dead
list.desc: Place a creature from your graveyard onto the battlefield under target opponent’s control.

list.name: Nevinyrral’s lil’ Disk
list.desc: Each player sacrifices a creature, an enchantment, and an artifact.

list.name: Seeds of Innocence
list.desc: Destroy all artifacts. For each artifact destroyed, that artifact’s controller gains life equal to that artifact’s converted casting cost.

list.name: Massive Mana Clash
list.desc: Each player flips a coin. Each time a player’s coin comes up tails, that player takes 1 damage. When a player’s coin comes up heads, he or she stops flipping. Repeat until each player’s coin comes up heads

list.name: Storm Seeker
list.desc: Target player takes 1 damage for each card in his or her hand.

list.name: Collective Unconscious
list.desc: Draw a card for each creature you control.

list.name: Chaos Knowledge
list.desc: Roll two Chaos Rolls (without resolving either), then choose one roll to ignore. Resolve the other roll.

list.name: Morbid Hunger
list.desc: Deal 3 damage to any target. Gain 3 life.

list.name: Essence Vortex
list.desc: Destroy target creature unless its controller pays life equal to its toughness. It cannot be regenerated.

list.name: Stupor
list.desc: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.

list.name: Braingeyser
list.desc: Target player draws 1d6 cards.

list.name: Stormbind
list.desc: Discard a card at random: Deal 2 damage to target creature or player. You may pay 2 to repeat this process until the end of the Chaos Phase.

list.name: Necropotence
list.desc: Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step. You may do this as many times as you wish but only during this Chaos Phase. Skip your draw step this turn.

list.name: Earthquake
list.desc: Deal 1d6 damage to each creature without flying and each player.

list.name: Stream of life
list.desc: Target player gains 1d10 life.

list.name: Fumarole
list.desc: Lose 3 life: Destroy target land and target creature.

list.name: Chaos Lore
list.desc: Choose one – Search your library for two basic lands and put them onto the battlefield; or search your library for a nonbasic land and put it onto the battlefield. Shuffle your library.

list.name: Winds of Change
list.desc: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.

list.name: WackyLand III
list.desc: Roll 1d3 times on WackyLand.

list.name: Polymorph
list.desc: Destroy target creature. It can’t be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.

list.name: Gold Strike
list.desc: All of your lands produce an additional mana of the appropriate type when tapped for mana this turn.

list.name: Portent
list.desc: Look at the top three cards of target player’s library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle his or her library. Draw a card.

list.name: Revenge is Sweet
list.desc: Sacrifice a permanent: destroy a permanent of the same type.

list.name: Soul Leech
list.desc: Deal 1 damage to up to three target creatures or players. For each point of damage dealt this way, gain 1 life.

list.name: Stasis
list.desc: Skip your untap phase this turn. At the beginning of upkeep for each player who is affected by this effect, that player may pay U or 3. If that player does, the next player in turn order gains this effect.

list.name: Pity
list.desc: The player with lowest amount of life gains 5 life. If more than one player has the lowest amount of life, ignore this effect.

list.name: Creeping Mold
list.desc: Destroy target artifact, land, or enchantment.

list.name: Mutual Betrayal
list.desc: Look at target opponent’s hand and choose a card. That player then looks at your hand and chooses a card. Exchange the cards chosen this way.

list.name: Chain Lightning
list.desc: Deal 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature’s controller may pay RR. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

list.name: Mana Short
list.desc: Tap all lands you control. Lands you control do not untap during your untap phase this turn.

list.name: Rolling Thunder
list.desc: Deal 1d6-1 damage divided any way you choose among any number of target creatures or players.

list.name: Goblin Game
list.desc: Each player hides at least one item, then all players reveal them simultaneously. Each player loses life equal to the number of items he or she revealed. The player who revealed the fewest items then loses half his or her life, rounded up. If two or more players are tied for fewest, each loses half his or her life, rounded up.

list.name: EnchantWorldLand+
list.desc: Leave any EnchantWorldLand in play. Roll on EnchantWorldLand and add that result to the battlefield.

list.name: Commanding Presence
list.desc: Opponents may not play spells or activate abilities until end of turn.

list.name: Illusions of Grandeur
list.desc: Gain 20 life and four illusion counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an illusion counter. When the last illusion counter is removed, lose 20 life.

list.name: Backflash
list.desc: This turn, whenever a card is cast from the graveyard using flashback, it is returned to its owner’s hand instead of being exiled.

list.name: Never Say Die
list.desc: Roll 1d6. All creatures in all graveyards with toughness less than or equal to the rolled number are returned to the battlefield under their owners’ control.

list.name: WackyLand
list.desc: Roll on WackyLand.

list.name: PersonaLand
list.desc: Roll on PersonaLand.

list.name: Fighting a Legend
list.desc: Each opponent rolls in PersonaLand.

list.name: Reclaim
list.desc: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay G or 3 to draw a card.

list.name: Prophetic Bolt
list.desc: Deal 4 damage to target creature or player. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

list.name: Hymn to Tourach
list.desc: Target player discards two cards at random.

list.name: Jester’s Cap
list.desc: Search through target player’s library for any three cards and exile those cards. That player then shuffles his or her library.

list.name: Agonizing Memories
list.desc: Look at target player’s hand and choose two cards from it. Put those cards on top of that player’s library in any order.

list.name: Time Crawl
list.desc: Pass the dice; your turn is over. Put a turn counter on the Time Crawl Jackpot.

list.name: Natural Order
list.desc: Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card of the same color and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

list.name: Relentless Assault
list.desc: After your attack phase, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

list.name: Grinning Totem
list.desc: Search target opponent’s library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven’t played it, put it into its owner’s graveyard.

list.name: Pestilence
list.desc: Deal 1d6 damage to each creature and each player.

list.name: Circle Shield
list.desc: Get three shield counters. Whenever you would take damage, instead remove a shield counter.

list.name: Impulse
list.desc: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

list.name: Temporal Spring
list.desc: Put target permanent on top of its owner’s library

list.name: Gamble
list.desc: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle your library.

list.name: Desert Twister
list.desc: Destroy target permanent.

list.name: Roll Three Times
list.desc: Roll three Chaos Rolls.

list.name: WackyLand
list.desc: Roll on WackyLand.

list.name: Forget
list.desc: Target player discards two cards, then draws as many cards as he or she discarded this way.

list.name: Gambit
list.desc: Each player chooses a card in his or her hand. Each player then reveals the card chosen this way. Put the creature with the lowest converted mana cost onto the battlefield under its owner’s control, then repeat with enchantments and artifacts. If two or more cards tie for the lowest converted mana cost, put all those cards onto the battlefield.

list.name: Luck
list.desc: Reveal your hand and choose an instant or sorcery card from it at random. Play that spell without paying its casting cost. If X is in the casting cost, X is 0.

list.name: Windows of Opportunity
list.desc: Target player taps all artifacts, lands, and creatures he or she controls. At the end of your turn, tap all artifacts, lands, and creatures you control.

list.name: Energy Bolt
list.desc: Choose one – Deal 1d6 damage to target player or gain 1d6 life.

list.name: Price of Knowledge
list.desc: Skip your next turn. Draw four cards.

list.name: Tremble
list.desc: Each player sacrifices a land.

list.name: Jokulhaups Light
list.desc: Each player sacrifices one land, one creature, and one artifact.

list.name: Cone of Flame
list.desc: Choose three target creatures or players. Deal 1 damage to the first, 2 damage to the second, and 3 damage to the third.

list.name: Fact or Fiction
list.desc: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

list.name: Happy Balance
list.desc: Each player reveals cards from the top of his or her library and puts lands and creatures revealed in this way onto the battlefield until he or she controls a number of lands and creatures equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the most and the number of creatures equal to the number of creatures controlled by the player who controls the most. Place cards revealed in this way but not put onto the battlefield on top of each player’s library. Each player then shuffles his or her library and draws cards until each player has as many cards in hand as the player with the highest number of cards in hand.

list.name: Happy Land
list.desc: Choose one – Roll on EnchantWorldLand; roll on WackyLand; or roll in PersonaLand.

list.name: Confiscate
list.desc: Gain control of target permanent.

list.name: CounterRoll
list.desc: Get a CounterRoll counter. Sacrifice CounterRoll to counter the effects of any roll.

list.name: Flux
list.desc: Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards. Draw a card.

list.name: PersonaLand
list.desc: Roll on PersonaLand.

list.name: Wager
list.desc: Target opponent names a number and reveals cards from his or her library until he or she reveals a spell of the named casting cost, then puts that card into his or her hand. That player then puts all other revealed cards into his or her graveyard and takes 1 damage for each card put into the graveyard in this manner.

list.name: Wheel of Fortune
list.desc: Each player discards his or her hand and draws seven cards.

list.name: Double-Sided Blade
list.desc: Roll 1d6. Any combination of players of your choice draws that many cards. For each card you draw, take 2 damage. For each card drawn by an opponent, that player takes 1 damage.

list.name: Clash of Chaos
list.desc: Choose target opponent. Flip a coin. Opponent calls it in the air. Loser of the flip takes 2 damage. Winner decides to flip again or to stop.

list.name: Master Chef
list.desc: Choose one – Get a CounterRoll counter (sacrifice CounterRoll to counter the effects of any roll); or get a RollFork counter (sacrifice RollFork to duplicate the effects of any Chaos effect just rolled; you choose all new targets).

list.name: All Hallow’s Eve Light
list.desc: Each player puts up to two creatures from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.

list.name: Mana Barbs
list.desc: Whenever you tap a land for mana, you take 1 damage.

list.name: Retribution
list.desc: Choose two target creatures controlled by one player. That player sacrifices one of those creatures. Put a -1/-1 counter on the other.

list.name: WackyLand
list.desc: Roll on WackyLand.

list.name: Infernal Tutor
list.desc: Choose a number. Reveal cards in your library until you reveal a permanent with a converted mana cost equal to the chosen number. Put that card onto the battlefield and exile all other cards revealed this way.

list.name: Mind Bend
list.desc: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word or basic land type with another. This does not end at the end of the turn.

list.name: Drain Life
list.desc: Deal 1d6 damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than that creature’s toughness or that player’s life total.

list.name: Desperate Times
list.desc: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one in your hand and the other two into your graveyard. Roll again.

list.name: Distract: After your turn, you and all cards you control phase out.
Patience
list.desc: Lose 2 life and gain three focus counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a focus counter. When the last focus counter is removed, gain 5 life.

list.name: Price of Immortality
list.desc: Discard a card. Gain 4 life.

list.name: Gaea’s Charm
list.desc: Choose one – Target player shuffles up to three cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library; or exile three cards from target player’s graveyard. Draw a card.

list.name: Five Card
list.desc: Each player reveals the top five cards of his or her library. The player whose revealed cards have the highest converted mana cost puts those five cards into his or her hand, and all other players place their revealed cards in their graveyards.

list.name: Ill-Gotten Gains
list.desc: Each player discards his or her hand, then returns up to three cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

list.name: Murphy’s Law
list.desc: Roll two Chaos Rolls (without resolving either), then target opponent chooses one roll to resolve and makes all decisions in regards to it. Ignore the other roll.

list.name: Regrowth
list.desc: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

list.name: Chaos Storm
list.desc: Roll two Chaos Rolls and reverse the direction of turns.

list.name: CounterRoll
list.desc: Get a CounterRoll counter. Sacrifice CounterRoll to counter the effects of any roll.

list.name: Storm Seeker Misses
list.desc: Take 1 damage for each card in your hand.

list.name: Price of Strength
list.desc: Lose 4 life. Place two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

list.name: Global Stream of Life
list.desc: Each player gains 1d10 life. (Roll once for everybody.)

list.name: Disenchant
list.desc: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

list.name: Gathering
list.desc: Gain 1 life for each creature in play.

list.name: Gift of the Magi
list.desc: Choose one – Fain 3 life; draw three cards; or add three mana of any color to your mana pool at the beginning of your next main phase.

list.name: RollFork
list.desc: Get a RollFork Counter. Sacrifice RollFork to duplicate the effects of any roll just rolled. You choose all new targets.

list.name: Price of Power
list.desc: Sacrifice a land. Deal 4 damage to any target.

list.name: EnchantWorldLand+
list.desc: Leave any EnchantWorldLand in play. Roll on EnchantWorldLand and add that result to the battlefield.

list.name: Pillage
list.desc: Destroy target artifact or land. It cannot be regenerated.

list.name: Stronghold Discipline
list.desc: Each player loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls.

list.name: Soothing Balm
list.desc: Target player gains 5 life.

list.name: Topple
list.desc: Exile target creature with the highest power. If two or more creatures are tied for highest power, you choose which to target.

list.name: Ray of Command
list.desc: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

list.name: Gerrard’s Wisdom
list.desc: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

list.name: Peace Talks
list.desc: As long as you remain in the game, until your next turn, skip all attack phases and no player may cast a spell that targets a player.

list.name: Arcanix Ray
list.desc: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If it’s the named card, the player puts it into his or her hand. Otherwise, the player puts it into his or her graveyard and Arcanix Ray deals 2 damage to him or her. Draw a card.

list.name: Truce
list.desc: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way, that player gains 2 life.

list.name: Meet in the Middle
list.desc: Discard or draw until you have exactly four cards in hand.

list.name: Land Ho!
list.desc: Each player may put up to three lands from his or her hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.

list.name: Unearth
list.desc: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

list.name: Blue
list.desc: The next spell you play is countered. When this occurs, get a CounterRoll counter. Sacrifice CounterRoll to counter the effects of any roll.

list.name: Wackyland III
list.desc: Roll 1d3 times on WackyLand.

list.name: Control Magic
list.desc: Gain control of target creature.

list.name: Intimidation
list.desc: Until your next turn, you cannot be attacked.

list.name: Lightning Round
list.desc: Until your next turn, when any player casts a spell, that player draws a card.

list.name: Unhinge
list.desc: Target player discards a card. Draw a card

list.name: PersonaLand
list.desc: Roll on PersonaLand.

list.name: Calm Before the Storm
list.desc: There are no Chaos Phases until your next turn. Then, until your next turn after that, players roll two Chaos Rolls per turn.

list.name: Peek
list.desc: Look at target player’s hand. Draw a card.

list.name: Yawgmoth’s Will
list.desc: Until end of turn, you may play cards from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

list.name: Triple EnchantWorldLand
list.desc: Destroy all EnchantWorldLand effects. Roll three times on EnchantWorldLand and put all those effects in play.

list.name: CounterRoll
list.desc: Get a CounterRoll counter. Sacrifice CounterRoll to counter the effects of any roll.

list.name: Swords to Plowshares
list.desc: Exile target creature. That creature’s controller gains life equal to its power.

list.name: Price of Support
list.desc: Sacrifice a creature. Place four 1/1 Spirit tokens that are all colors onto the battlefield.

list.name: Time Twister
list.desc: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. Each player then draws seven cards.

list.name: Misfortune
list.desc: An opponent chooses one – You place a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and gain 4 life; or you put a -1/-1 counter on each creature that player controls and that player takes 4 damage.

list.name: Hymn of Rebirth
list.desc: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

list.name: Sift
list.desc: Draw three cards then choose and discard a card.

list.name: RollFork
list.desc: Get a RollFork Counter. Sacrifice RollFork to duplicate the effects of any roll just rolled. You choose all new targets.

list.name: Conjure
list.desc: Search your library for an artifact card and put it onto the battlefield. Shuffle your library.

list.name: Helm of Obedience
list.desc: Target opponent puts cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard until a creature card or 1d6 cards are put into that graveyard this way, whichever comes first. If a creature card is put into that graveyard this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

list.name: Balloon
list.desc: Each time you tap a land for mana this turn, gain 1 life.

list.name: Lucky Us
list.desc: Each player reveals the top card of his or her library. If that card is a Planeswalker, creature, enchantment, artifact, or land card, that player puts it directly onto the battlefield. If it is an instant or sorcery, that player casts it without paying its casting cost.

list.name: Rediscovery
list.desc: All cards that have been exiled face up are shuffled into their owners’ libraries.

list.name: PersonaLand
list.desc: Roll on PersonaLand.

list.name: Diminishing Returns
list.desc: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. Each player exiles the top four cards of his or her library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

list.name: Power Surge
list.desc: For each untapped land you control, Power Surge deals 1 damage to you.

list.name: Ancestral Lands
list.desc: Search your library for a basic land card of each type you do not control and put those lands onto the battlefield. Shuffle your library.

list.name: WackyLand
list.desc: Roll on WackyLand.

list.name: Chaos Storm
list.desc: Roll two Chaos Rolls and reverse the direction of turns.

list.name: Innocent Blood
list.desc: Each player sacrifices a creature.

list.name: Charm
list.desc: Choose one – Deal 1 damage to any number of targets, then draw a card; or draw cards until you have as many cards in hand as the player with the most cards in hand, then draw a card.

list.name: Global Half-Hymn
list.desc: Each player discards one card.

list.name: Trade-In
list.desc: Sacrifice a creature. Put target creature card from your graveyard or your hand onto the battlefield.

list.name: Go Fish
list.desc: Name a nonland card. Look at all players’ hands and put all copies of the named card into your hand. If no player has the named card, draw a card (go fish).

list.name: Blessed Wine
list.desc: Gain 1 life. Draw a card.

list.name: Psionic Blast
list.desc: Deal 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to yourself.

list.name: Vampiric Tutor
list.desc: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay B or 2 life to draw a card.

list.name: Shortcut
list.desc: Target creature gains a landwalk ability of your choice.

list.name: EnchantWorldLand
list.desc: Roll on EnchantWorldLand.

list.name: Time Walk
list.desc: Take an extra turn after this one.

list.name: Wanna Bet?
list.desc: Look at target player’s hand and choose a card in it. That player looks at your hand and chooses a card in it. Flip a coin. The winner of the flip puts the card he or she chose into his or her hand.

list.name: Hurricane
list.desc: Hurricane deals 1d6 damage to each creature with flying and each player.

list.name: Lat-Nam’s Legacy
list.desc: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. Draw two cards.

list.name: Magical Sleight
list.desc: Change all occurrences of one mana symbol on any card in play to any other mana symbol. This change does not end at the end of the turn.

list.name: Spring Cleaning
list.desc: Destroy all lands. Any player may pay 1 life to prevent up to two lands he or she controls from being destroyed this way. Players may pay any amount of life in this way.

list.name: Brandish
list.desc: All cards in all libraries, in all hands, and on the battlefield not controlled by their owners go to their owners’ graveyards.

list.name: East Wind
list.desc: As long as you remain in the game, until your next turn, if no other player is affected by East Wind, whenever any player would gain life you gain it instead.

list.name: Fall Harvest
list.desc: Sacrifice a land. Gain life equal to the number of lands you control.

list.name: Steal Artifact
list.desc: Gain control of target artifact.

list.name: Feast or Famine
list.desc: Choose one – Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield; or destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature and it can’t be regenerated.

list.name: Chaos Tune
list.desc: Choose any roll from the Chaos List and resolve it.

list.name: Time Sprint
list.desc: Take two extra turns after this one.

list.name: Musical Chairs
list.desc: Each player moves one seat in the direction the turns are proceeding.

list.name: Musical Chairs Darkside
list.desc: Each player moves one seat in the direction the turns are proceeding. They now need to 'lose' as this new deck and try to make their previous deck win, to win the game!

list.name: It’s a New Ruling
list.desc: Add up all numbers on target permanent and redistribute them however you wish.

list.name: Pricing
list.desc: Each player may sacrifice any number of permanents. Then, for each permanent that isn’t a basic land, each player loses 3 life for each rare he or she controls, 2 life for each uncommon he or she controls, and 1 life for each common he or she controls.

list.name: Rainbow Vale
list.desc: Put a token land named Rainbow Vale onto the battlefield under your control. It has “Tap: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. An opponent gains control of Rainbow Vale at the beginning of the next end step.”

list.name: Musical Life
list.desc: Each player’s life total becomes that of the player before him or her in the turn order.

list.name: Calculator
list.desc: Add or subtract 1d6 on any number of any permanent on the battlefield.

list.name: Turn Twister
list.desc: Until your next turn, at the end of each turn, randomly choose who takes the next turn.

list.name: Escape
list.desc: Target land you control gains “At end of your upkeep, exile a creature you control. Flip a coin. On heads, target player of your choice gains control of this land. When this land leaves the battlefield, all creatures exiled by it enter the battlefield under control of the last player to control it.”

list.name: Magnet
list.desc: Target creature gains “While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, each player must choose this creature if able.”

list.name: Wrath of the Random
list.desc: Destroy all permanents with a converted casting cost equal to the roll on 1d6.

list.name: Chaos Ward
list.desc: Target creature gains Protection from Chaos. This does not end at the end of the turn.

list.name: Fun Time
list.desc: Roll once on Chaos List, WackyLand, PersonaLand, and EnchantWorldLand.

list.name: Time Wall Safe
list.desc: Skip one of your phases this turn. Get a Safe counter for that phase. At any time you could play an instant, you may sacrifice a Safe counter to take the phase that was skipped.

list.name: nruT
list.desc: Your turn begins with the end of the turn phase and proceeds backward through the order of phases and steps: end of turn, second main phase, combat, first main phase, draw, upkeep, untap, Chaos Phase. When you reach your Chaos Phase in this way, roll a Chaos Roll. Resolve that roll and end your turn.

list.name: Expansion in a Bottle
list.desc: Choose an expansion. Destroy all nonland permanents from the chosen expansion.

list.name: Ka-Ching!
list.desc: Put a colorless artifact token named Black Lotus onto the battlefield. It has “Tap: Sacrifice Black Lotus: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.” Put a colorless artifact token named Mox Pearl onto the battlefield. It has “Tap: Add W to your mana pool.” Put a colorless artifact token named Mox Sapphire onto the battlefield. It has “Tap: Add U to your mana pool.” Put a colorless artifact token named Mox Jet onto the battlefield. It has “Tap: Add B to your mana pool.” Put a colorless artifact token named Mox Ruby onto the battlefield. It has “Tap: Add R to your mana pool.” Put a colorless artifact token named Mox Emerald onto the battlefield. It has “Tap: Add G to your mana pool.” Put a colorless artifact token named Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. It has “If Mox Diamond would enter the battlefield, you may discard a land card instead. If you do, put Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. If you don’t, put it into its owner’s graveyard. Tap: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.”

list.name: Time Crawl Jackpot!
list.desc: Put a turn counter in the Time Crawl Jackpot. After this turn, you take an additional turn for each turn counter in the Time Crawl Jackpot.

list.name: Josh
list.desc: Roll 1d6; and X becomes the result. For each opponent, lose X life. Each opponent gains X life. Until you have taken X turns, you and permanents you control have hexproof and cannot be attacked and creatures you control are unblockable.

list.name: Jake
list.desc: Put a 5/5 blue Squid token onto the battlefield under your control. Until your next turn, whenever a roll is made on PersonaLand, put an additional 5/5 blue Squid token onto the battlefield under your control.

list.name: Ray
list.desc: All opponents’ life totals become 1. A player who dies this turn gets four Spite Rolls instead of one. At the end of the turn, all opponents gain life equal to the life they lost this turn.

list.name: Theo
list.desc: Draw three cards. Target opponent discards a card. Discard a card at random. Theo deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

list.name: Lee
list.desc: You and target opponent exchange life totals.

list.name: Mark Rosewater
list.desc: Roll three times on Chaos List without resolving any of those rolls. Instead, each result becomes an instant effect with converted casting cost 0 that you may cast any time you could cast an instant. They are no longer Chaos Rolls.

list.name: Brian
list.desc: Get a Brian counter. Sacrifice Brian to add or subtract 10 from the value of X in any casting cost that includes an X.

list.name: Dylan
list.desc: Choose one – Gain 2 life for each green creature one the battlefield; or cast two spells from your hand without paying their casting costs.

list.name: Tim
list.desc: Until you gain 5 or 6 life in this manner, at the beginning of your upkeep, gain 1d6 life.

list.name: Scott
list.desc: Place target creature card from any graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Each opponent reveals the top card of his or her library. You put each creature card revealed this way onto the battlefield under your control and each other card into its owner’s graveyard.

list.name: Iyarwein
list.desc: Put a Hat counter on target creature. All creatures with Hat counters cannot be blocked. Remove a Hat counter from a creature: Exile target creature.

list.name: Ian
list.desc: Choose a target permanent. Target player other than the permanent’s controller gains control of it. Treat that permanent as though it were just cast. Destroy all EnchantWorldLands. Roll on EnchantWorldLand.

list.name: Grahame
list.desc: Get a Grahame counter. When you die, you may sacrifice a Grahame counter. If you do, shuffle your graveyard, hand, and all permanents you own into your library. Draw seven cards. Your life total becomes half of your previous starting life total, rounded up.

list.name: Mike
list.desc: Look at all players’ hands. Pay 1 life: Target player discards a card of your choice. You may activate this ability as many times as you wish during this Chaos Phase.

list.name: Trevin
list.desc: Put a Trevin counter on each of your creatures. A creature with a Trevin counter on it gains +1/+1. Remove a Trevin counter: That creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

list.name: Sharon
list.desc: Target creature you control loses all creature types and becomes a Sniper instead. It gains defender and “Roll 1d6; and X becomes the result. Tap: Deal X damage to attacking creature.”

list.name: Weissman Blast!
list.desc: Name a card that isn’t a basic land. Search all graveyards, hands, and libraries for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then all players shuffle their libraries. Exile all permanents on the battlefield with the same name as that card.

list.name: Manhito
list.desc: Choose one

list.name: Shroomie
list.desc: You may choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your command zone. At the end of each turn, beginning with the player whose turn it is, each player rolls 1d6. If a player rolls a 6, that player puts the chosen card into his or her hand.

list.name: Bahahala
list.desc: Get a Chaos Tune counter. Sacrifice Chaos Tune at any time to change any Chaos Roll to any other Chaos Roll.

list.name: Masquerade Cycle
list.desc: Any player may pay the activation cost of any activated ability of any nonland permanent.

list.name: Mirari Concentrate
list.desc: All creatures gain +1/+1. All lands produce an additional mana of the appropriate type when tapped for mana. Whenever a player plays an instant or sorcery spell, that player may pay 4. If he or she does, he or she puts a copy of that spell onto the stack. That player may choose new targets for the copy.

list.name: Concordant Crossroads
list.desc: All creatures gain haste.

list.name: Odyssey Block
list.desc: Each instant and sorcery gains flashback. The flashback cost is equal to the card’s mana cost.

list.name: Howling Mine
list.desc: At the beginning of each player’s draw step that player draws an extra card.

list.name: Cursed Rod
list.desc: All creatures lose all abilities.

list.name: Urza’s Epic
list.desc: All cards without cycling cost an additional 1 to play and gain “Cycling: 2.”

list.name: Bottomless Pit
list.desc: At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, that player discards a card at random.

list.name: Invasion Block
list.desc: At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, that player gains 1 life for each basic land type among lands he or she controls and loses 1 life for each basic land type he or she does not control.

list.name: Aluren
list.desc: Any player may play creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less without paying their mana cost and as though they had flash.

list.name: Circle of Life
list.desc: Whenever a card would go to the graveyard from play, shuffle it into its owner’s library instead.

list.name: Locomotion Drain
list.desc: Creatures with defender may attack as though they didn’t have defender. Creatures without defender can’t attack.

list.name: Rath Cycle
list.desc: Each instant and sorcery gains buyback. The buyback cost is life equal to its mana cost.

list.name: Psychic Battle
list.desc: Whenever a player chooses one or more targets, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. The player who reveals the card with the highest converted mana cost may change the target or targets. If two or more cards are tied for highest cost, the target or targets remain unchanged. Changing targets this way doesn’t trigger abilities of permanents named Psychic Battle.

list.name: City of Solitude
list.desc: Players can cast spells and activate abilities only during their own turns.

list.name: Forsaken Wastes
list.desc: Players can’t gain life. At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, that player loses 1 life.

list.name: Gift of the Land
list.desc: Whenever a player draws a card, he or she reveals the card drawn. If it is a land, he or she gains 2 life. Otherwise, he or she loses 1 life.

list.name: React
list.desc: Each player may play spells and activate abilities in response to Chaos Rolls.

list.name: Up the Stakes
list.desc: Double all life gained or damage dealt outside the Chaos Phase.

list.name: Rainbow Vortex
list.desc: Basic lands may tap for any color of mana. When a nonbasic land enters the battlefield, its controller chooses a color. That land loses all other abilities but gains “Tap: Add one of the chosen color to your mana pool.”
